trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_SEQ_00<tab>Poor Wafufu's food cart is light a few lunches, and she needs help locating the lost meals.
TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_SEQ_01<tab>Search the Moraby Drydocks for four missing lunches.
TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_SEQ_02<tab>You have located all four lunches. Now hurry them back to Wafufu before foreman Ahtbyrm does something drastic!
TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_SEQ_03<tab>Your efforts have spared Wafufu a terrible fate...that in all likelihood would have never befallen her anyway (but don't tell her that).
TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_WAFUFU_000_1<tab>Oh, woe is me! I seem to have gone and misplaced four of my packed lunches. Whatever am I to do? I can hear Ahtbyrm's belly grumble from all the way over here!

TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_WAFUFU_000_2<tab>I'm certain I made enough for everyone, so it must be that I either dropped a few, or gave some to the wrong fellows. Oh, did you hear that? It was Ahtbyrm's belly again. He does not look at all pleased, does he?

TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_WAFUFU_000_3<tab>I must stay with my cart, but if you could search the Drydocks and see if you cannot find those lunches, I would be eternally grateful. I might even whip together something special for y─ Ah! Did you see that? Ahtbyrm just gave me the evil eye. If those lunches don't turn up soon, I'm afraid he'll come over here and eat <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_LYNGSTYRM_000_10<tab><sigh> Don't tell me. You came to collect my lunch. I can see it in them accusing eyes of yours.

TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_LYNGSTYRM_000_11<tab>Sure, I knew right well that none of these lunches was meant for me, what with today being my day off and all. But I never thought little Wafufu would miss just <var 1A 02 /var>one<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_LYNGSTYRM_000_12<tab>If I give back the lunch, would you promise me you'll not mention that it was I who took it? I don't want the lass to think I was trying to swindle her...though that's sort of what I was trying to do... But she doesn't have to know that now, does she? Right then! Carry on!
TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_MAETIMYND_000_20<tab>Wafufu be needin' one o' her lunches back, ye say?

TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_MAETIMYND_000_21<tab>And here I was beginnin' to think the lass had eyes fer me. Not that she's me type, mind ye. I like me women a few hands taller...and a few ponzes heavier...<var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> a few shades bluer, if ye catch me drift.

TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_MAETIMYND_000_22<tab>I wouldn't have minded the extra meal, though. A man can work up quite a cravin' when he's been poundin', stretchin', and shapin' sheets of iron all <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((day)) ((night)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((day)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_WAFUFU_000_30<tab>Please tell me you found the lunches. I swear Ahtbyrm has shifted several paces closer since you departed!
TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_WAFUFU_000_31<tab>One, two, three...four! You did it! You found all the missing lunches!
TEXT_SUBSEA112_00409_WAFUFU_000_32<tab>Now, perhaps, I can rest in peace, knowing that Ahtbyrm won't be indulging in his cannibalistic fantasies...
